response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer at $14,500. This price reflects the high quality and potential impact of the product, while also ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way we can further discuss the details.", "product_price": 14500}
